pages.title: Lunar Insight
pages.text: This religious text will teach you how to harness $(item)Starlight$().$(br2)Use your $(l:portal_hub/5_hook)Hook$() to climb one of the floating shrines that looms over the $(item)Dark Thicket$() biome to find this Knowledge.$(br2)It may be wise to bring a $(item)Workbench$() so you can craft the $(item)Luminous Crafting Table$().

This knowledge is required before you can make a $(l:sim_2/4_star_power)Resonating Wand$(), and start making things through the power of the $(item)Stars$().$(br2)You can learn more about $(item)Astral Sorcery$() by reading the $(item)Astral Tome$().
